From: RoboRick007 <rfa007@...>

::DrillBit::

He easily evaded the optic blasts. He aims all of his weopons at the
enemy. (50cal. gattaling gun x 1, insect leg machine guns x 6, optic
lasers x 2) He opened fire.
"Do your worst! We'll scrap ya!"

OOC: Most people dont take much damage when I shoot the the 50cal.
gattaling gun, so I'll explain about it. A 50cal. would be the kind of
thing mounted on a helicopter or a jet fighter. It's big and powerful. A
50cal. can blow a 1 foot hole in a 6 inch thick stone wall. So will
people please get hurt once in a wile. You dont have to do this when
hit, but for the record, you would br loseing limbs if hit by this.
